ofx:section.ofx:title: Installation of Eclipse
ofx:section.ofx:section:
Download eclipse-luna from www.eclipse.org
Subversion (SVN)
Help - Eclipse Marketplace Find : "Subversive" - Go Install SVN Team Provider 2.0 Confirm - (Proceed even if "Subversive SVN Team Provider 2.0" is not available) - Accept - Finish - Restart
Project Explorer - (r.click) New - Other - Maven - Checkout Maven Projects from SCM - Next - "Find more SCM connectors in the m2e Marketplace""
Find: "subversive" Select "m2e-subversive" - Finish
Next - next - Accept - Finish "unsigned content": OK - RESTART
SVN KIT 1.8.5

ofx:section.ofx:title: Maven Git Connector
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph:
ProjectExplorer - (r.click) New - Other - Maven - Checkout Maven Projects from - Next
Find more SCM connectors in the m2e Marketplace
Find: "m2e"
Select "m2e-egit"
Finish - Next - Next
"I accept the terms of the license agreements" - Finish
Restart Eclipse

ofx:section.ofx:title: Checkout GIT repository
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph:
ProjectExplorer - (r.click) New - Other - Maven - Checkout Maven Projects from SCM
SCM URL: git http...
Next

ofx:section.ofx:title: Checkout Project From SVN Repository
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph:
Window - Show View - Other - SVN - SVN Repositories
New - "Repository Location", enter URL, username and password. FINISH
Select Trunk - "Checkout as Maven Project" - NEXT - FINISH

ofx:section.ofx:title: FAQ
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: Q: Hanging during start at org.eclipse.mylyn.tasks.ui A: In most cases it's the best to restore the complete workspace from a backup.
